class.name: ViewportTexture
class.brief_description: Texture which displays the content of a [Viewport].
class.description: Displays the content of a [Viewport] node as a dynamic [Texture]. This can be used to mix controls, 2D, and 3D elements in the same scene. To create a ViewportTexture in code, use the [method Viewport.get_texture] method on the target viewport.

members.member: The path to the [Viewport] node to display. This is relative to the scene root, not to the node which uses the texture.
